title: Indians in World War One
itunes:title: Indians in World War One
itunes:subtitle: Professor Santanu Das explores the experiences of Indians who fought in and were affected by the First World War and explains how he has utilised a wide range of sources to uncover their forgotten stories
description:
Professor Santanu Das explores the experiences of Indians who fought in and were affected by the First World War and explains how he has utilised a wide range of sources to uncover their forgotten stories

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
